p.p: A subset of the Snomed-CT clinical terminology (i.e. coding system) intended for use in the UK, previously named SnomedCTUK, that describes the religious or other belief system affiliation of a person.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Religious or Other Belief System Affiliation subset with subset original id 10791000000130.
The use of this subset is Advisory, as defined in the "Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains" document located under the Associated Specifications tab.
